House, M.D.

(a Titles &
Air Dates Guide)

by TVmaze

Last updated:
Wed, 4 Nov 2015 0:00
aired from: Nov 2004
to: May 2012
cancelled/ended		 176 eps Fox (US) 60 min drama
medical
  • Hugh Laurie as Dr. Gregory House
  • Lisa Edelstein as Dr. Lisa Cuddy [ 1-7 ]
  • Omar Epps as Dr. Eric Foreman
  • Robert Sean Leonard as Dr. James Wilson
  • Jennifer Morrison as Dr. Allison Cameron [ 1-6 ]
  • Jesse Spencer as Dr. Robert Chase
  • Olivia Wilde as Dr. Remy 'Thirteen' Hadley [ 4-7 ]
  • Kal Penn as Dr. Lawrence Kutner [ 4- ]
  • Peter Jacobson as Dr. Chris Taub [ 4-8 ]
  • Odette Annable as Dr. Jessica Adams [ 8 ]
  • Charlyne Yi as Dr. Chi Park [ 8 ]

Medical puzzles are solved by a brilliant but misanthropic diagnostician and his team.
